product_name: Innova Disc Golf Blizzard Boss Distance Driver Disc
long_description: The Innova Disc Golf Blizzard Boss distance driver disc is ideal for advanced players looking for a disc that can devour huge distances off the tee. It's great for sidearm and backhand throws. Crafted from a blend of resilient polymers to offer the best combination of grip and durability. Innova Disc Golf Blizzard Boss is PDGA approved for use on all disc golf courses. Sorry, color and weight requests cannot be accommodated; please shop in-store for specific colors and weights.
